name: RESET YOUR LIFE
description:
This is a short and engaging platformer game, where you have to find keys to open the door.

But there is a twist.

You have to "RESET" your life timer every 60 seconds.

Following are the instructions on how to play the game.

-You Are Trapped In The Sky City.

-You Have To Find All Five Keys To Unlock

  The Door.

-You Have To 'RESET' Your Life Timer 

  Every 60 Seconds With The Help Of Healing    

  Stations.

-There Are 10 Chests Across The City. But

  Only Five Of Them Contains The key. Other 

  Chests Are Empty.

-Each Chest Costs 5 Gems To Open Whether 

  It Has The Key Or Not.

-So Make 'MINIMAL INTERACTIONS' With 

  The Chests To Avoid Loosing Gems For 

  Nothing. 

Controls

W - Move Forward

S  - Move Backwards

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Space - Jump

Shift + Direction - Sprint or Run

E - Interact

Esc - Pause The Game
